definition: lacking even the rudiments of courage, a disloyal person who betrays or deserts his cause or religion or political party or friend etc.
details:
adjective
- lacking even the rudiments of courage
= synonyms: craven
- having deserted a cause or principle
= example: having deserted a cause or principle
= synonyms: renegade
noun
- a disloyal person who betrays or deserts his cause or religion or political party or friend etc.
= synonyms: ratter
- an abject coward
= synonyms: craven
